name: THESE ROBOTS HATE EACH OTHER
description:
FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

Two robots with a turbulent past, trapped in an energy cube together. Divide the limited pool of energy wisely and use each bots unique abilities to get both to the end portal!

This was a 100% solo project, everything in this game was created by me within the 48-hour time period for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (I did skip a few corners though, the music was edited from full tracks I produced before the jam).

FAT BOT CONTROLS:
  • W --> Jump
  • A --> Move Left
  • D --> Move Right
  • Q --> Grab/Release Other Robot
FLYING BOT CONTROLS:
  • H --> Move Left
  • K --> Move Right
  • J + SPACE --> Shoot Attractor Ball (pulls other robot up)
